mapper.insert: insert into mote_task ( user_id, task_id, create_time, update_time, order_no, express_company_id, express_no, self_buy_fee, status) values (#{userId}, #{taskId}, now(), now(), #{orderNo}, #{expressCompanyId}, #{expressNo}, #{selfBuyFee}, #{status})
mapper.update: update mote_task set user_id = #{userId}, task_id = #{taskId}, update_time = now(), order_no = #{orderNo}, express_company_id = #{expressCompanyId}, express_no = #{expressNo}, self_buy_fee = #{selfBuyFee}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
update mote_task set update_time = now(), order_no = #{orderNo}, status = 2 where id = #{moteTaskId}
update mote_task set self_buy_fee = #{fee}, status = 4 where id = #{moteTaskId}
update mote_task set express_company_id = #{expressCompanyId}, express_no = #{expressNo}, self_buy_fee = #{fee}, status = 5 where id = #{moteTaskId}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, task_id, create_time, update_time, order_no, express_company_id, express_no, self_buy_fee, status from mote_task where id = #{id}

select t.id,t.create_time,t.title, t.number as total_num, sum(case when mt.status =1 then 1 else 0 end) as accpeted_num, sum(case when mt.status =2 then 1 else 0 end) as ordered_num, sum(case when mt.status =3 then 1 else 0 end) as finish_show_num, sum(case when mt.status =4 then 1 else 0 end) as self_buy_num, sum(case when mt.status =5 then 1 else 0 end) as return_num, sum(case when mt.status =6 then 1 else 0 end) as kefu_num, sum(case when mt.status =7 then 1 else 0 end) as finished_num from mote_task mt,task t where mt.task_id=t.id and t.status=#{status} and mt.task_id in
#{item}
